thread.title: Ralph G
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Ralph G

author: Ralph G
title: Ralph G
text:
Bought new tires 3 weeks ago and the following week I had a low pressure indicator light pop up. Took the car back to Garrett and the boys and found that I had a nail in one of my tires.
Garrett plugged it and offered to replace the tire, no charge. I couldn't believe it! He didn't have to offer it up but this showed me that his (their) customer service was top notch!
I work in tech support for my company and know that companies live or die by their service. TFT Londonderry just earned my business! Thank you!
